meanings.definition: The state or condition of being a major.
meanings.sent1: In the army, achieving majorships requires dedication and hard work.

meanings.sent5: The majorships of the students were recognized with a special award ceremony.

meanings.definition: The rank or position of a major in the military.
meanings.sent1: The majorships in the army come with great responsibility and authority.

meanings.sent5: The majorships of the officers were crucial in maintaining order and discipline.

meanings.sent1: The majorships of the organization gathered to discuss important strategies.
